subject: docs(about): replace code snippet with prose about building the app
body:
Replace the Java code snippet in the About section with a first-person
narrative explaining why this site was built as a living CV instead of
a static PDF. Covers the frontend stack (React 19, TypeScript, Vite,
Tailwind CSS v4, PWA), the backend service (Vercel serverless functions
with self-hosted SMTP, designed as a shared multi-app API platform),
and the deployment pipeline (GitHub Pages via GitHub Actions).

Add the About component to App.tsx after Hero, before Projects.
Remove the PortfolioCallout component â€” the new About section covers
the same ground with more detail.
